product_name: ExOfficio ExO JavaTech T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The ExOfficio ExO JavaTech(TM) T-Shirt is designed for active performance with its embedded processed coffee grounds that pull perspiration away from the skin to keep you dry and comfortable. Cotton/recycled polyester fabric provides superior odor and moisture control; recycled coffee grounds in the fibers pull perspiration away from skin for quick evaporation. With a UPF 15 rating, fabric provides good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Hidden stash pocket in the bottom hem holds small items. Closeout.
short_description: The ExOfficio ExO JavaTech(TM) T-Shirt is designed for active performance with its embedded processed coffee grounds that pull perspiration away from the skin to keep you dry and comfortable.
